description.value:
You arrange a spiky cage of bones, particularly tough vegetation, or other material to spring up when disturbed. The snare deals @Damage[9d8[piercing]] damage to the first creature to enter this square; that creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:31] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is knocked aside by the snare's deployment, taking half damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of its next turn.

Failure The creature is captured by the cage, taking full damage and falling @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} while it remains within the cage. It can get free by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escaping} (DC 31) or by destroying the cage (Hardness 5, HP 30, object immunities).

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature takes double damage.
